title: Underwriting Review for Home Insurance
description: An underwriter is reviewing a new application for homeowner's insurance and sees a potential risk.

tasks.description: Review the submitted application and property inspection report.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter notes the inspection report mentions an unfenced swimming pool.

tasks.description: Determine that an unfenced pool is an unacceptable hazard according to underwriting guidelines.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter flags the application as requiring action.

tasks.description: Communicate to the agent that the policy can be issued, but only if the applicant provides proof that a fence has been installed around the pool.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter clearly documents the conditional approval and the required action.
